name: Once Upon a Book - GWJ27
description:
Once Upon a Book is a stop motion claymation* game, where you have to solve a literary puzzle dealing with stories in books.

(Clay models are not real. they are actually blender models.)

Featuring stop motion animations, using clay-like and plywood-like models

Including several versions of branching stories

This game was made for the Godot Wild Jam #27, under the theme Books. All wildcards were included:
- Tamer: make a game where you can turn enemies into friends
- Stay awhile: create a rich backstory for your game
- Dramatis non persona: make a character out of an inanimate object
